sentences: Maurice Nikolaevich Yaklashkin (Russian: Мори́с Никола́евич Якла́шкин; born on August 4, 1947,.
Maurice Yaklashkin born on August 4, 1947 in the village Chuteevo of the Yantikovsky District of the Chuvash ASSR (RSFSR/USSR).
In 1966 he graduated from the music department Kanash pedagogic college school.
In 1968-69 Maurice Yaklashkin taught in the Jantikovo secondary school, thereafter, in 1973–77, he worked at Kanash pedagogic college.
In 1973 Maurice Yaklashkin receive a diploma of the Chuvash State Pedagogical Institute.
In 1982 he graduated from the Gorky State Conservatory (in the class of Professor A. A. Lebedinsky.)
